Html:
Hi All,

I have created the Project using PrismFrame work with the help of Closeable TabItem as Main view. When i close the TabItem prism region also get lasted. How can i avoid this problem ?

Please find the sample link under the following location.

http://www.mediafire.com/?yro8ydyhphzgk0c

Please find the video demo link under the following link :

http://www.mediafire.com/?j6vl5s3tcbbpf2v

Hoping for better solution :)

Thanks and regards,

Sakthi

Hi,

As explained in this blog post from David Hill, closing and removing views from a region, can be difficult. In this blog you can find information and a sample with multiple views displayed in a tab control, which might help you with your issue.

I hope you find this handy

Agustin Adami
